citation: State Service (Agencies and Heads of Agencies) Order (No. 2) 2021 (Tas)
text:
State Service (Agencies and Heads of Agencies) Order (No. 2) 2021

I, the Governor in and over the State of Tasmania and its Dependencies in the Commonwealth of Australia, acting with the advice of the Executive Council, make the following order under section 12 of the State Service Act 2000 .

22 November 2021

B. BAKER

Governor

By Her Excellency's Command,

PETER GUTWEIN

Premier

1. Short title
    This order may be cited as the State Service (Agencies and Heads of Agencies) Order (No. 2) 2021 .

2. Commencement
    This order takes effect on 1 December 2021.

3. Principal Act
    In this order, the State Service Act 2000 is referred to as the Principal Act.

4.
    The amendment effected by this clause has been incorporated into the authorised version of the State Service Act 2000 .

Displayed and numbered in accordance with the Rules Publication Act 1953.

Notified in the Gazette on 26 November 2021

This order is administered in the Department of Premier and Cabinet.
